title: Drawing, "Project for a vase", 1827–35
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash on paper
signed: Signed in reddish ink, below drawing, lower right: J. Seethaler
inscribed: Inscribed in reddish ink, lower right: [cut off number]
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: On a wooden plinth, calyxes surround the lower part of the body, a wave motif on shoulder, leaves on neck; two handles made up of griffins.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for a vase", 1827–35.
1827–35. Pen and black ink, brush and wash on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-338.
